Seminar Topic: EVIDENCE-BASED EXERCISE PRESCRIPTION IN HEALTH AND DISEASE
The purpose of this course is to determine effective, evidence-based best practice within high performance and clinical settings. Key topics will include elite endurance performance, healthy ageing, chronic disease prevention and treatment, and weight management.
description: Current topics and research in specific areas.
